name: hexane

procedures: T1010::[HEXANE] has used a PowerShell-based keylogging tool to capture the window title.
T1016.001::[HEXANE] has used tools including [BITSAdmin] to test internet connectivity from compromised hosts.
T1016::[HEXANE] has used [Ping] and `tracert` for network discovery.
T1018::[HEXANE] has used `net view` to enumerate domain machines.
T1021.001::[HEXANE] has used remote desktop sessions for lateral movement.
T1027.010::[HEXANE] has used Base64-encoded scripts.
T1033::[HEXANE] has run `whoami` on compromised machines to identify the current user.
T1049::[HEXANE] has used [netstat] to monitor connections to specific ports.
T1053.005::[HEXANE] has used a scheduled task to establish persistence for a keylogger.
T1056.001::[HEXANE] has used a PowerShell-based keylogger named `kl.ps1`.
T1057::[HEXANE] has enumerated processes on targeted systems.
T1059.001::[HEXANE] has used PowerShell-based tools and scripts for discovery and collection on compromised hosts.
T1059.005::[HEXANE] has used a VisualBasic script named `MicrosoftUpdator.vbs` for execution of a PowerShell keylogger.
T1069.001::[HEXANE] has run `net localgroup` to enumerate local groups.
T1082::[HEXANE] has collected the hostname of a compromised machine.
T1102.002::[HEXANE] has used cloud services, including OneDrive, for C2.
T1105::[HEXANE] has downloaded additional payloads and malicious scripts onto a compromised host.
T1110.003::[HEXANE] has used password spraying attacks to obtain valid credentials.
T1110::[HEXANE] has used brute force attacks to compromise valid credentials.
T1204.002::[HEXANE] has relied on victim's executing malicious file attachments delivered via email or embedded within actor-controlled websites to deliver malware.
T1518::[HEXANE] has enumerated programs installed on an infected machine.
T1534::[HEXANE] has conducted internal spearphishing attacks against executives, HR, and IT personnel to gain information and access.
T1555.003::[HEXANE] has used a [Mimikatz]-based tool and a PowerShell script to steal passwords from Google Chrome.
T1555::[HEXANE] has run `cmdkey` on victim machines to identify stored credentials.
T1567.002::[HEXANE] has used cloud services, including OneDrive, for data exfiltration.
T1583.001::[HEXANE] has registered and operated domains for campaigns, often using a security or web technology theme or impersonating the targeted organization.
T1583.002::[HEXANE] has set up custom DNS servers to send commands to compromised hosts via TXT records.
T1585.001::[HEXANE] has established fraudulent LinkedIn accounts impersonating HR department employees to target potential victims with fake job offers.
T1585.002::[HEXANE] has established email accounts for use in domain registration including for ProtonMail addresses.
T1586.002::[HEXANE] has used compromised accounts to send spearphishing emails.
T1588.002::[HEXANE] has acquired, and sometimes customized, open source tools such as [Mimikatz], [Empire], VNC remote access software, and DIG.net.
T1589.002::[HEXANE] has targeted executives, human resources staff, and IT personnel for spearphishing.
T1589::[HEXANE] has identified specific potential victims at targeted organizations.
T1591.004::[HEXANE] has identified executives, HR, and IT staff at victim organizations for further targeting.
T1608.001::[HEXANE] has staged malware on fraudulent websites set up to impersonate targeted organizations.

description: [HEXANE](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1001) is a cyber espionage threat group that has targeted oil & gas, telecommunications, aviation, and internet service provider organizations since at least 2017. Targeted companies have been located in the Middle East and Africa, including Israel, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Morocco, and Tunisia. [HEXANE](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1001)'s TTPs appear similar to [APT33](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0064) and [OilRig](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0049) but due to differences in victims and tools it is tracked as a separate entity.(Citation: Dragos Hexane)(Citation: Kaspersky Lyceum October 2021)(Citation: ClearSky Siamesekitten August 2021)(Citation: Accenture Lyceum Targets November 2021)
